content:
Congratulations on your promotion! I'd be happy to help you plan a dinner party to celebrate.

To provide you with the best recommendations, I'll need to know the city you're in. Could you please tell me the city or metropolitan area where you're looking to host your dinner party?

Additionally, do you have any specific preferences or requirements for the restaurant, such as:

* Cuisine type (e.g., Italian, Steakhouse, Seafood, etc.)
* Budget per person
* Ambiance (e.g., formal, casual, outdoor seating, etc.)
* Any dietary restrictions or preferences (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.)

Once I have this information, I can suggest some popular restaurants in your area that can accommodate a group of 10-12 people.
